Text: I have downloaded this twice now. Neither time would it load.  I tried with both mpc and vlc. Also tried converting with no luck.

Just use VLC Media Player,its the best player out there,plays everything and its free!! Get it from here:

For those saying use VLC, that doesn't work.  If you bothered to read my comment you would see that I tried both it and Media Player Classic.  The Codec Pack i use for MPC is K-Lite.   Between the 2 of them I have never had a problem loading an undamaged video and even some damaged once I can load with VLC.  When you right click this one even it doesn't give you the normal right click option. This download is just a waste of time.
happy to post that this video plays just fine..no issues reported. thanks!!
